oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Forage receipt
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Forage receipt signed by Capt. George Turner referencing the lack of payment for supplies taken by Col. McKenzie's cavalry command. This is most likely forage taken ny McKenzie's 5th Tenn. Cav., CSA. Capt. Turner does not appear on the rolls of this regiment, but the records for this unit are often found to be incomplete.
